title: So ive been in silver for a week now, heres my take.
body:
Comparing silver 5 to bronze 5 (i demoted from a couple bad teams to s5, but based on my recent performance that wont last long)

Silver skill wise is bronze + ego, with the occasional actually good player.

Imho i have met more players in bronze 5 that deserve silver based on my observations than games ive actually played in silver, i myself am walking proof that you can be hardstuck in super low elo bronze but play at a level of a higher elo (everyone ive talked to thought this account would tank after the first few games, but my performance has only been going up after i got over the initial culture shock of playing in a different elo)

BUT there is a difference.

I find silver players to be less temperamental than bronze players, which in turn supports my initial theory that i was hardstuck bronze due to tilt.

See in silver a game where everyone just gets along and has a good time is not some rare one in 50 games unicorn, i get one every few games, and my god does it make a difference to your performance, hell my first kayn penta, my first penta in silver, had one of such teams, everyone was nice cohesive, and we all ended up getting insanely fed due to it to the point me and the yas 2v5 penta'd their team.

tl;dr, silver players mechanically can be worse than bronze 5 players, even on the macro play level, but they make up for it by not being immature little kids and knowing how to let you carry if you are capable of it.

A closing point though, im not saying silver is some elo heaven where trolls dont exist, theres this one guy who will repeatedly ban kayn when he sees me simply because hes convinced im a feeder for some reason, even if it was to the detriment of the team and even though i have destroyed him in lane multiple times, going back to me tilt = hardstuck theory, can you guess how many games said rager has played in silver? almost 500 now.

But without a doubt silver is immensely less toxic than bronze, to the point id actually say bronze is about 20 times more toxic, and mean it.

Why should you listen to my opinion rather than some super high elo player?

Because im not someone who was bronze 3 years ago.

Im someone who literally skipped straight from bronze 5 to silver by simply making a new account, so both elos are still fresh in my mind, hell i still jump on yellowbrickroad every now and then, and low and behold i absolutely stomp the enemy when i do simply because im not perma tilted anymore, i havnt gotten any better than i was a week ago, i didnt magically go up an entire division skill wise, im just not tilted.

You could say im biased with a confirmation bias, and thats possible, but at the end of the day, thats my take on the difference between the elo's.

replies.body:
41% w/r and a 1.6 kda average on kayn..

Your a god mate, should be diamond easy

70% winrate last 20 games.

"performance has been going up since i got over the initial culture shock of playing at a higher elo"

Nice analysis though mate.

Top notch shit.

you have a 53% winrate over the last 20 games.
Not exactly amazing and your feast or famine playstyle means that to gauge your true average winrate, you need a larger sample size due to the high variance. 

Also when you do your placements on a new account, you are basically guaranteed at least Silver 5, a friend went 1W9L in their placements and got placed Silver 5.

Tanking from there down to bronze requires you to lower your mmr substantially or play over multiple ranked seasons. Silver 5 on a fresh account is not an achievement.

He was specifically referring to my kayn which is currently 49% overall winrate and 69% last 20.

You are correct about needing a larger sample size to truly guage my performance which is why im basing on my recent performance rather than overall right now (my recent performance shows a trend of improving rather than stagnating as i went from a 20% last 20 games winrate to 53% as you mentioned)

I also placed silver 4 not 5, i only hit 5 fairly recently and have been steadily rising back up (minus the occasional hiccup)

Lol what culture shock? b2 to s3 basically play like garbage.

How long till this account is back in bronze ðŸ¤”

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=cheesyleeks

Youre hardstuck bronze 2 dude, you are the exact type of person you are trying to shit on right now.

Lol im a garbage casual who plays stupid shit like fiddle mid or ap nasus Support.Never said im anything more. A week ago i was b3 0lp

Cant rustle these jimmies my dude.

Thats my point dude, its hypocritcal to call someone trash when you are worse than them.

You are no better than the low elo players arguing about lcs players, everytime you talk all anyone heres is reeeeeeeeeeeee.

it could be worse

i could be constantly making threads along the lines of " i hard carry every game but cant get out of bronze 5 because of muh team mates"

Could be worse, you could be that guy, prove you were right by doing just that.

Then have some retard on the forums still try to argue with you as if you were wrong.

See, lil timmy, your argument broke down the second i DID climb out of b5 by simply having better teammates.

because thats the only thing i changed by changing my elo forcibly by making a new account, the calibre of the players around me.

higher calibre players, higher elo.

Funny that im not tanking, despite being a solid full tier above my main.

And as inaccurate as op.gg mmr is, pretty sure a 1000mmr difference should equate to lower performance, but hey it hasnt.

So i mean.... fuck dude, its almost like playing in a higher elo, where the players are undoubtedly better than the elo of my main, and not losing every game, implies that shit.... maybe my mains in the wrong elo?

I mean fuck dude, crazy concept right, i mean mmr is fool proof and absolutely nothing is wrong with it.

But hey bronze 3 guy here who has a low enough mmr he could actually be matchmade with my main account if he played enough games says otherwise.

case in point, lil witch eve down there, aka percival.

He used to be like you, only knew me through the forums, thought i was just some shit talking rager, hell if i remember correctly he even made a few comments like yours.

Then he played two games with me, 2, by chance even pure matchmaking.

Now look at him, complete 180, because actions, speak much louder than words.

tl;dr, either everyone in silver should be in b5.

or im not meant to be in b5 on my main.

You literally can only pick one, and to argue against that, well quite frankly is by definition retarded as it requires for your logical process to just go to utter shit somewhere along the line.

https://media.tenor.com/images/9543655e42222c2ba2eea8da45e328bc/tenor.gif

> He used to be like you, only knew me through the forums

thing is I supped for you once as thresh and you picked kalista. arrogant and wouldn't listen to anything i said, no play making ability just when kill for kill then by level 6 you didn't even take ult....i actually thought wow this dude really is as retarded as he seems on the forums. luckily i was with my duo partner and when the lane ended i just went and supped for him then the rest of the team.

last time i looked you were 41% w/r , just checked now and your 39% lol,logic tells me that anything over 51% and your climbing,you wont be silver much longer. your not as good as you think you are, just accept it and maybe learn from it instead of acting like your a carry lord who should be diamond.

"not as good as you think"

"is currently an entire division higher than the elo he repeatedly claimed he was for the last year"

I always said i was b1 at the very least.

Im currently s5.

"39% winrate" cute ignore the fact that the first 20 or so games after placement were racked with shitty games, also ignore the 60% last 20 games overall i was toting before getting my last 3 games (all 3 i can guarantee you were short bus teams, the one with the kennen the kennen got 9 reported because he was trolling the entire game, to make matters worse 2 were jg and one was autofilled support, so shortbus laners + all 3 games being a role that relies on atleast one laner being somewhat competent to be able to fulfill said roles tasks = not a fun time)

Come back when you have an argument that i cant shoot down in literally about 30 seconds of my time? actually no lets say 60 seconds, im a fast writer but not thaaaat fast.

making a new account and getting the standard s4/5 placement is a good achievement.

897 games on main... still bronze 5 

no K:d:a Average over 3 on both accounts

need i say more.

My first ever account i got placed b4 by losing 6 games.

This predates yellowbrickroad.

You are honestly retarded if you think you just get placed silver by default, you START at silver, but you literally hemorrhage mmr by losing games during placements.

a brand new account that wins 10 out of 10 games gets placed in plat.

A brand new account that wins 1 game gets placed low bronze.

trust me dude, ive got more smurfs than you have years on this planet, i know how the bloody placements system works.

your emphasis on kda is also laughable.

you have one champion below 3 kda, yet you are sub 50% winrate b2.

You are walking proof of the statement "a high kda does not mean you win alot"

Infact, kda warriors make up most of low elo.

Common misconception of people who talk shit about me is that they assume since i play assassins that im running around farming "named minions"

When in reality im topping the meters in objective damage, controlling vision, and map pressure, you know, shit that actually wins games, shit that also puts you in the firing line for getting killed if you are the only person doing it.

Theres a reason in literally any game where my team performs even slightly above average my kda skyrockets, its not because i magically play better, its because pressure is taken off me so i can do my job without getting 5 man dogpiled.
umm 1W 9L gets you silver 5. My sister scored this in placements.

> your emphasis on kda is also laughable.

feed to win, good strat.

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/02/mj-laughing.gif

Further more, got curious about your claim of having played with me so decided to do a quick ctrl+f of my match history.

You must have one impressive memory, because even if you did play a game with me, that game is so old it was literally cleared from the cache of the api.

Either that or youre just bullshitting.

Either way the game either doesnt exist or was from literally 2-3 months ago and 5-600 games ago in which case you wouldnt remember shit about it, unless im just that important to you that i somehow made a permanent mark on your mind.
it was about 3-4 months ago. i don't really care what you believe it was definitely you unless theres another yellow brick road that plays kalista like garbage on oce.

So basically i trigger you so hard that you remember a game from 3-4 months ago.

i dont even remember players i played with 3 hours ago unless they were spectacular.

I normally hate using this statement because its such a cop out.

But i think you need to get a life dude, if im that encompassing of your life that you have literally burned a memory of one game we played into your long term memory, then you are clearly lacking something.

Anyway youve started repeating yourself like a broken record now, so ima leave, it got boring.
You both are suck cuties ðŸ™ƒ
good job dude {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> Imho i have met more players in bronze 5 that deserve silver based on my observations than games I've actually played in silver

This could be because to demote from S5 to B1 you need an MMR of almost a B5 (which I find unfair). 

The times I played against you were really difficult due to you having superior mechanics, but I would win because you would rage a lot and be super toxic and tilt. 

I'm glad you've experienced an environment where you should be, because this has helped get rid of the toxic you (based on the fact there aren't 3 rage posts a day anymore xD), which in turn has meant you are much better because of it. 

Well done :D

Haha cheers dude, originally with my performance in silver i was like "welp looks like im not quite there yet" but recently ive gone from about a 30% winrate to 70% so we can chalk that down to an adjustment period.

personally i dont think you belong in b5, been awhile since i played but i do remember you beating me atleast once or twice haha.

Sorry dude your still shit at this game it's just bronzies haven't figured out how Kayn works yet. You spend 3 years in bronze and get into S5 and try to give your 
"take on the difference between the elo's.". Bahahahahaha

This is a really big cop-out if you really deserved silver you would get yourself out of  it instead of making a new account and basically getting silver for no hard work put in.

Quite frankly I am very disappointed, if you really think you are silver worthy climb out of it yourself.
if you want help or even some games add me im willing to help you climb out of bronze if you truly want to prove something because all you have done is cheat your way out of it
IGN: AoiKitsune
what if you never had the opportunity to be bronze? Some people start in silver and only go up from there, never experiencing bronze (except maybe when they play on a friend or sibling's account).
